# Auto-generated for Visuals auto-generated (anime/live action)
def visuals_auto_generated_anime_live(script_path, output_dir="generated/videos"):
    """Create a slideshow-style video from a text script using PIL and moviepy."""
    import os
    from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
    from moviepy.editor import ImageSequenceClip

    os.makedirs(output_dir, exist_ok=True)
    frames = []
    with open(script_path, "r", errors="ignore") as script:
        for idx, line in enumerate(script):
            img = Image.new("RGB", (1280, 720), color=(255, 255, 255))
            draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
            try:
                font = ImageFont.truetype("DejaVuSans.ttf", 40)
            except Exception:
                font = ImageFont.load_default()
            draw.text((50, 350), line.strip(), fill=(0, 0, 0), font=font)
            frame_path = os.path.join(output_dir, f"frame_{idx:03d}.png")
            img.save(frame_path)
            frames.append(frame_path)
    if frames:
        clip = ImageSequenceClip(frames, fps=1)
        video_path = os.path.join(output_dir, "output.mp4")
        clip.write_videofile(video_path, codec="libx264")
        return video_path
    return None
